title: Since 2021 February 12's Update, the speaker option on the phone does not work. Google needs to fix!
content: Since February 2021 update, the phone's speaker does not work. What the hell is going on with these high paid techs that do not test their updates before implementation? Fix this ASAP Google or we will become Samsung fans expeditiously. Callers can't here me unless I use a Bluetooth.
